messages.title: Fighting for their future
messages.content: New Lib Dem plans will give every child a real chance

messages.title: Four steps to a fairer Britain
messages.content:
1. Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket 
2. A fair chance for every child 
3. A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener 
4. A fair deal for you from the government

keyPolicies.policyDescription: You pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn—cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Create jobs by making Britain greener.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the government
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems have announced new plans to cut the tax bills of ordinary families across Britain.
issues.education: Under the Lib Dems, primary schools will be able to offer after-school clubs and summer school, helping to give every child a world-class education no matter where they live or who their parents are.
issues.environment: A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener.
issues.governance: A fair deal for you from the government: Make politicians accountable and give you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

quotes.text: Lib Dem leader Nick Clegg said, 'This is about investing in our future. We want a cleaner, safer, fairer Britain where everyone has the best start in life.'

images.caption: Lib Dem Leader Nick Clegg wants to build a better future for our children
